first_para: Sarah Louise Newton FRSA (born Sarah Louise Hick, 19 July 1961) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Truro and Falmouth.

full.extract: Sarah Louise Newton FRSA (born Sarah Louise Hick, 19 July 1961) is a British Conservative Party politician who was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Truro and Falmouth.
full.title: Sarah Newton
